issue.title: set model configuration not work with bullet

content.raw:
Yes, I test the command line for joint `shoulder_pan_joint`, and the robot moved as expected.
```
gz joint -m ur10 -j shoulder_pan_joint --pos-t -100
```

Does the `set_model_configuration` service call use this interface to do it?

By the way, does gazebo have inner controllers for robot, and can these controllers used by gazebo API?
content.html:
Yes, I test the command line for joint shoulder_pan_joint, and the robot moved as expected.

gz joint -m ur10 -j shoulder_pan_joint --pos-t -100

Does the set_model_configuration service call use this interface to do it?

By the way, does gazebo have inner controllers for robot, and can these controllers used by gazebo API?
